title: Short-Intensive Online Real-Time PPKN Character-Based Scientific Inquiry Instructional Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of citizenship education, experience using online learning tools, and foundational understanding of scientific inquiry methods (observation, hypothesis formulation, experimental design, data analysis, conclusion drawing)
context.additional_context: Development of science-integrated PPKN characters using mixed research methods (R&D) and the Dick and Carey model, integrating the scientific inquiry process (hypothesis formulation, variable control, data collection/analysis, evidence-based conclusion) into character design, with emphasis on causal analysis of variables during experimental design.

learning_goals: Learners systematically analyze the 5S principles (smile, greeting, etiquette) using scientific observation and variable analysis methods to establish actionable plans for daily life.

Learners design strategies for forming honesty and hygiene habits reflecting religious/non-religious values using the scientific inquiry method (hypothesis setting–experimentation–analysis–conclusion).
Learners present a plan for cultivating aesthetic sensibility and scientific creativity combined through art activities (visual arts, music) as a creative inquiry process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
